name: Fate of Ra
description:
Fate of Ra  is a 3D Quest Game.

- ABOUT -

The prophecy states that it takes 5 gods to unleash a power on the mountain of the sacred sun. Ra knows he will need the help of his friends. So he is on the way to find the other 4 gods Anubis, Seth, Sobek and Thoth, but the other gods have problems and Ra is getting quests to solve them.

Will the other gods help ... ? And will Ra get the mysterious power ... ? What is that power ... ?

- CONTROLS -

MOVE :  W A S D (Keyboard)  &  Left Stick (Controller)

CAMERA :  Mouse  &  Right Stick (Controller)

INTERACT :  E (Keyboard) & Left Mouse Click  &  X / A (Controller)

- CREDITS -

Made by Stephan  / MoonKami

SFX & Music by Epidemic Sounds and WeLoveIndies & Editing by Stephan / MoonKami with Reaper & FMOD

UI / UX by Photoshop/Illustrator

Made with Unity & Blender

I appreciate it if you like that game and leave a comment down below!!  :)
